#Here is a custom example using the built-in `mtcars` dataset:

```{r my-analysis}
# Basic statistics of the mtcars dataset
summary(mtcars)

# Plotting mpg vs hp
plot(mtcars$hp, mtcars$mpg,
     main = "MPG vs Horsepower",
     xlab = "Horsepower",
     ylab = "Miles Per Gallon",
     col = "blue",
     pch = 19)
